formatedText.text: Form matches of three in-a-row by swapping adjacent tiles. For example, these flashing tiles can be swapped.
Drive this piece to the bottom of the game field by getting rid of tiles under it and you will see it added to the item outline on the left.
Tiles can only be swapped if it results in matching three in a row.
Finish the level by dropping all the item pieces to the bottom of the game field.
Item pieces can also be moved if it results in a match.
This is your carpet-bag. By clicking on it you can view all the items you have been able to collect in this country and read Mr. Fogg's note-book.
By clicking the eye you can pause the game and enjoy beautiful views of the land you are in.
This is a timer. It shows how much time you have left to complete the level.
This is a time bonus. Drive it down to the bottom of the game field to collect it and freeze the timer.
A pack of bonus points. Drive it down to the bottom of the game field to earn extra score points.
A bonus life. Free it through the bottom of the game field to collect it.
By matching four tiles or more you recharge and upgrade the power-ups that will help you free the way for the item pieces. Charge the power-up to 100% to be able to use it.
A charged power-up can be upgraded by continuing to match four tiles or more. The Hammer will be upgraded when the meter is full.
The Hammer power-up is ready! You can use it to get rid of an inconvenient tile on the game field. To do that click on the Hammer and point to the tile you want to smash.
You have upgraded the Hammer to Tesla's Hammer. It can be used to destroy all tiles of a certain type present on the game field.
You have charged the Bomb power-up. It can be used to destroy a cluster of tiles in a certain area of the game field.
You have charged the Fireball power-up. It will help you clear the way for the item pieces in multiple directions.
Make matches of three or more tiles to open the stamp that is hidden under the game field.
You have revealed a part of the stamp. Continue to play and open the rest of it step by step.
The stamp is almost yours! You are very close to getting this material proof for Mr. Fogg. Open the remaining parts to finish the level.
A locked tile. To break the lock bring the other matching tiles to the locked one.
A double-locked tile. You will need to break the lock twice.
A frozen tile. It's frozen to its spot and won't move until you melt it by placing 2 matching tiles next to it.
A deep-frozen tile. It will take twice as long to melt it.
This is part of the wall. Pieces will not go through.
This is debris. It cannot be matched with tiles. You can get rid of it by dropping it through the bottom of the game field.
You acquired your first stamp. You can view the items you collected in this country as well as the country intro by clicking on the stamp.
